mapper.select: select m.id, m.pass, m.mnum, m.type, m.name, m.gender, m.email, m.phone, m.birthday, m.career, m.attachid, m.reg_date, m.up_date, m.del_date, m.del_yn, m.attachid, i.originalfilename, i.storedfilename, i.filesize from member m, image i where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass} and del_yn='N' and m.attachid=i.attachid
select count(*) from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass} and del_yn='N'
select id from member where email=#{email} and name=#{name} and phone=#{phone} and del_yn='N'
